headline: Palo Alto Networks Inc. (PANW) Targets $15B in Recurring Revenue
summary: Palo Alto Networks Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the best tech stocks to buy for the long term. On September 4, the company’s CEO, Nikesh Arora, reiterated that the company is facing a robust cybersecurity landscape. Consequently, it has set a goal to achieve $15 billion in annual recurring revenue by 2029 and 2030. In […]
